tool_description: Random words and more provided by RandomWordGenerator.com
title: Random Word Generator

api_list.name: Generate a random word
api_list.description: Scour through thousands of words from the RandomWordGenerator.com database

api_list.name: Generate a random sentence
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://random-word-generator2.p.rapidapi.com/sentence.php"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-word-generator2.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
